job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: PenguinData Workforce Management Systems, Inc. is currently seeking a full-time Software Engineer with at least 5 years of experience to work remotely with our team. This person will work closely with our Senior Manager of Software Engineering and our Chief Information Officer to create software solutions and focus on the re-platforming of our SaaS solution hosted in AWS. You will work with internal staff to analyze and refine requirements, develop solutions, test and document code. A strong background in application development and services development is required. Being authorized to work in the U.S. is a precondition of employment at PenguinData and we do not provide sponsorship for an employment-based visa status at this time. Job Duties: Research, design, and development of new software programs or features on existing products Development, testing, monitoring and maintenance of Rest and SOAP Services Analysis of user requirements Code testing, designing, and re-writing (as necessary) Creation of operational documentation with technical authors Working closely with other staff (being a team player is a must) Consultation with clients and colleagues concerning the maintenance and performance of software systems Technical Qualifications: PHP JavaScript AWS Cloud9 JSON XML API Development/Consuming Rest SOAP SQL (PostgreSQL experience is a plus) Object Oriented Design Principals Code Documentation GIT Repository ASP.Net (C#) MVC Architecture Entity Framework/ADO.Net Visual Studio Bootstrap JQueryUI The ideal candidate will also have experience with: Android Mobile Application Development JIRA CSS HTML 5 Qualifications Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field Development experience with programming languages SQL database or relational database skills
